overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Apollo CarMix represents the next generation of construction technology, digitizing mobile concrete plant operations through advanced mobile applications. As the React Native developer, I built a comprehensive system that integrates AR technology, IoT sensors, and intelligent concrete management.

challenge.title: Construction Industry Challenges
challenge.description: Traditional concrete production relies on manual processes, lacks real-time monitoring, and provides limited quality control. Construction sites need intelligent, automated solutions for consistent concrete quality and operational efficiency.

problems.title: Manual Mix-Design Control
problems.description: Error-prone manual dosing and inconsistent concrete quality

problems.title: Limited Real-Time Monitoring
problems.description: Lack of live data on production status and quality metrics

problems.title: Complex Machinery Operation
problems.description: Steep learning curve for operators on sophisticated equipment

problems.title: Quality Documentation
problems.description: Manual paperwork and certification processes prone to errors

solution.title: Smart Construction Solution
solution.description: I developed an innovative React Native application that revolutionizes concrete production through AR visualization, IoT integration, and intelligent automation systems for optimal construction site efficiency.

features.title: Augmented Reality Integration
features.description: 3D machinery projections and interactive AR experiences that bring construction equipment to life on mobile devices.

features.title: Concrete-Mate Smart System
features.description: Intelligent mix-design control supporting up to 15 formulas and 99 material types with automated dosing and quality monitoring.

features.title: IoT Sensor Integration
features.description: Advanced load cell weighing system with 4 electronic sensors providing precise control and instant data collection.

features.title: Smart Operations Management
features.description: Comprehensive control system with geolocation, engine diagnostics, and automated certification generation.
